cleaned.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard wbETH on Aave V3 BNB Chain
cleaned.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard wbETH on Aave V3 BNB Chain
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---

Title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard wbETH on Aave V3 BNB Chain 
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-03-05

---

## **Summary**

This TEMP CHECK proposes the addition of wbETH the Binance Liquid Staked ETH Token to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

Liquid Staked Tokens are one of the premier collateral types on Aave and drive most of the ETH borrow demand. wBETH is one of the largest Liquid Staking Tokens on the market and one of the more productive assets available on BNB Chain.  

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract: [0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1](https://bscscan.com/token/0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1)

Detailed risk parameters will be formulated and shared in the ARFC phase, after positive community feedback from this TEMP CHECK.

**Useful links:** 
- Website: https://www.binance.com/en/ethereum-staking

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

---

Title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard BNBx on Aave V3 BNB Chain  
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-03-04

---

## **Summary**

This TEMP CHECK proposes the addition of BNBx from Stader to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

BNBx is a liquid staked token of BNB from Stader. Users can freely mint BNBx in exchange for BNB deposits and earn yield from staking.

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract address: [0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275](https://bscscan.com/token/0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275)

Detailed risk parameters will be formulated and shared in the ARFC phase, after positive community feedback from this TEMP CHECK.

**Useful Links**

- Website: https://www.staderlabs.com/
- BNBx docs: https://binance.docs.staderlabs.com/

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

raw.title: [ARFC] Onboarding ETHx to Aave V3 Ethereum Market
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---

Title: [ARFC] Onboarding ETHx to Aave V3 Ethereum Market
Author: @0xTogbe - Aave Chan Initiative
Created: 2023-11-27

---

# Summary

This ARFC proposes the addition of the liquid staking token ETHx from Stader to Aave V3 Ethereum to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

# Motivation

ETHx represents Stader’s staked ETH, providing users with liquid staking benefits. Supporting ETHx on Aave V3 continues our advocacy for LST diversity, complementing existing assets like stETH, cbETH and rETH.

# Specification

Contract Address: ETHx - [0xA35b1B31Ce002FBF2058D22F30f95D405200A15b](https://etherscan.io/address/0xA35b1B31Ce002FBF2058D22F30f95D405200A15b)

After review of initial Risk Parameters by Risk Managers (Gauntlet & Chaos Labs) there are currently two possibilities: to apply Conservative Risk Parameters or to apply Aggressive Risk Parameters.

Conservative Risk Parameters Option:
 
![Captura de pantalla 2023-12-06 a las 20.04.33.png](ipfs://bafkreidqhtw5gyy7rjhw3mm2re7biyw2do72bzzsyf3eohhzd65akwo4zu)
    

Aggressive Risk Parameters Option:
 
![Captura de pantalla 2023-12-06 a las 20.03.40.png](ipfs://bafkreihf7ncuqhms5c67x2mhyspcdkahvjlzp7jmlha2ezqor7kyogvdai)
    
    
# Next Steps

1. Solicit feedback from the Aave community.
2. If community sentiment is favorable, proceed with the ARFC snapshot.
3. Success in the snapshot leads to the development of an AIP.

# Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skywards.
The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Stader and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

# Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

cleaned.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193

raw.title: [ARFC] Proposal to Allocate AGD treasury to Aave DAO
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
## [ARFC] Proposal to Allocate AGD treasury to Aave DAO

## **Author:** ACI

## **Date:** 2025-02-03

## **Summary**

This is a proposal to allocate Aave Grants DAO (AGD) treasury to Aave DAO, since Aave Grants DAO is winding down. 

## **Motivation**

Following the latest update by 0xbill on AGD journey, and next steps ([Reflecting on AGD’s Journey and Next Steps](https://governance.aave.com/t/reflecting-on-agd-s-journey-and-next-steps/20792) )which is the result of [Update from Aave Grants: Winding Down AGD 1.0 and What’s Next](https://governance.aave.com/t/update-from-aave-grants-winding-down-agd-1-0-and-what-s-next/18707),  where operations were announced to be wounded down and team disbanded, in August 2024, Aave Grants DAO still controls a treasury of mixed assets, that we believe should be disbursed back to Aave DAO, that will decide its utility and destination.

## AGD Treasury

| **Asset** | **# of Tokens Held in Treasury or Allowance** |
| --- | --- |
| DAI | 478.61 |
| GHO | 321,768.10 |
| USDC | 6,738.05 |
| USDT | 7,281.89 |
| SAFE | 5,243.26 |
| AAVE | 2,275.81 |
| OP | 259,221.75 |

## Specification

Send AGD treasury to Aave DAO collectors:

Aave V3 Ethereum Collector : 0x464C71f6c2F760DdA6093dCB91C24c39e5d6e18c 

Aave V3 Optimism Collector: 

0xB2289E329D2F85F1eD31Adbb30eA345278F21bcf

Aave V3 Gnosis Collector:

0xB5b64c7E00374e766272f8B442Cd261412D4b118

## **Useful Links**

[**ARC: Aave Community Grants Program**](https://governance.aave.com/t/arc-aave-community-grants-program/3642) 

[**Update from Aave Grants: Winding Down AGD 1.0 and What’s Next**](https://governance.aave.com/t/update-from-aave-grants-winding-down-agd-1-0-and-what-s-next/18707) 

[**Reflecting on AGD’s Journey and Next Steps**](https://governance.aave.com/t/reflecting-on-agd-s-journey-and-next-steps/20792) 

## **Disclaimer**

This proposal is powered by Skywards. ACI is not directly affiliated with Aave Grants DAO and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

## **Next Steps**

1. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage.
2. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

## **Copyright**

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

cleaned.title: ARFC] Activate LUSD as Collateral on Aave V3 ETH Pool
cleaned.author: 0x329c54289Ff5D6B7b7daE13592C6B1EDA1543eD4

raw.title: ARFC] Activate LUSD as Collateral on Aave V3 ETH Pool
raw.author: 0x329c54289Ff5D6B7b7daE13592C6B1EDA1543eD4
raw.body:
---
title: [ARFC] Activate LUSD as Collateral on Aave V3 ETH Pool
author: Marc Zeller @marczeller - Aave Chan Initiative
date: 2023-08-06
---

## Summary

This ARFC proposes to activate LUSD as a collateral asset on the Aave V3 ETH pool. The proposed risk parameters for LUSD will mirror those currently in place for USDC on the same pool.

## Motivation

LUSD is a decentralized stablecoin minted by users of the Liquity Protocol. It has demonstrated its resilience and maintained a stable peg, even in volatile market conditions. By adding LUSD as a collateral asset on the Aave V3 ETH pool, we can offer our users more options for their DeFi activities. Furthermore, the integration of LUSD could potentially synergize with the GHO, enhancing liquidity and further reinforcing the stability of the peg.

## Specification

The proposed risk parameters for LUSD on the Aave V3 ETH pool are as follows:

| Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Loan-to-Value (LTV) | 77% |
| Liquidation Threshold (LT) | 80% |
| Liquidation Penalty | 4.5% |

These parameters are identical to those currently in place for USDC on the Aave V3 ETH pool.

## Disclaimer

This proposal is part of the [Skyward](https://governance.aave.com/t/introducing-skyward-a-free-service-for-aave-dao-by-aave-chan-initiative/13173/13) program, the ACI has not been compensated by any third-party to present this ARFC.
At the time of writing, the author does not hold LQTY tokens but owns some LUSD.

## Next Steps

1. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, escalate to AIP for final approval and implementation.

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via CC0.

decision.summary: The proposal seeks to recover inaccessible AAVE staking rewards for the Sablier Legacy v1.1 contract by transferring them to the Sablier treasury. Voting timeline and community sentiment strongly support this action. Historical similar proposals also passed with positive impacts, reinforcing the decision.
key_arguments_for: Sablier Legacy v1.1 contract cannot claim staking rewards due to immutable design.
Proposal prevents permanent loss of ~895.8 AAVE tokens by transferring to Sablier treasury.
Voting timeline shows unanimous early and stable support for YAE option.
Forum sentiment predominantly positive or neutral, supporting recovery of rightful rewards.
Similar past proposals passed with positive or neutral market impact, indicating community acceptance.
key_arguments_against: One negative forum comment expressed concern about implementation details.
Manual transfer sets precedent for exceptions that require careful governance oversight.

evidence.quote: Forum sentiment includes 3 positive, 1 negative, and 6 neutral comments before proposal deadline. The first comment strongly supports recovery of inaccessible rewards.
Timeline metrics show 100% lead ratio and stability for the YAE choice throughout all quartiles.
Similar proposals passed with YAE, yielding positive or neutral market responses and reinforcing community support for changes.

decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'YAE' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- Timeline metrics show strong, stable, and unanimous support for YAE throughout the vote.
- Forum sentiment mostly positive and neutral supports recovering legitimately earned but inaccessible staking rewards for Sablier.
- Similar past proposals with analogous goals passed successfully with positive or neutral market and TVL impacts, reinforcing the benefit of this change.
- The recommendation mirrors community sentiment and aims to safeguard protocol assets from loss, maximizing long-term health.
